biotools.summary:
An updated resource for experimentally supported lncRNA/circRNA cancer associations and web tools based on RNA-seq and scRNA-seq data.

lncRNA and cancer association database.

Lnc2Cancer, is a manually curated database that provides comprehensive experimentally supported associations between lncRNA or circRNA and human cancer.

bioschemas.name: Lnc2Cancer
